info.brief_description: Sonic and his friends become hosts to life from another planet.
info.description:
This story is also set in the world of Sonic the Hedgehog. A piece of rock from another planet holds these space worms that crashed on the planet of Sonic and his friends. Once crash landed the worms immediately need to find a warm body to be their host while at the same time reproduce in the body they are in to save their species of their destroyed planet. They find many potential host with Sonic and his friends causing many situations from silly to sexy while the worms causes changes in their body. I got the idea from another interactive story I read way back but unfortunately can’t be found anymore. What happens to them is all up to you.

Characters:
All the Sonic characters (comic, game, tv shows), but no humans (except Eggman). This story will assume that all the characters in each category above will all exist in one world.

General:
- Try to make the chapters long enough instead of adding short chapters
- make the chapters somewhat consistent with the choice previous instead of changing it entirely
- Have fun making up creative events in the story

Allowed:
Sex
Pregnant
Unbirth
Vore
Breast Vore
Cock vore (For worms going into male’s reproductive system. If you’re into that)
Body Transformation/Inflation (ex: bigger butt or boobs for females)
Body and Muscle Growth (Keep it to a minimal change)
Absorption
Anything else is fine

Not Allowed:
Scat
Gore
Watersports
Death
Futa

As mentioned before, go ahead and think of anything to add to this story. As long as it in the area that is allowed. Have a good time making this story as long as it can.

*Important Side Note*
If you have an idea for a chapter but don’t feel like writing it, no problem. I could write it for you and add it to the story. Just email or IM me on the site and give me your idea for a chapter and maybe I will make up the chapter. Just make sure you read the story until an end point is reach before pitching an idea so it would still follow the story. Also, make sure the idea still stays in what is allowed and prevent anything not allowed being entered. I can even add your profile name to show who gave me the idea (your choice of course).
